ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ACK!!  That s a great trade for sure!  I m level 28, and I have 1000 pp in the bank, just waiting to buy a drum.  And I STILL haven t gotten one.  :) Consider
ygData.messageBody:
ACK!! That's a great trade for sure! I'm level 28, and I have 1000 pp in
the bank, just waiting to buy a drum. And I STILL haven't gotten one. :)
Consider yourself extremely lucky!

P.S. Of course now, that 1000pp will probably start going toward lambent
armor. Maybe I'll just have to pry the drum out of the cold dead hands of
the princess myself one of these days.


Laluni Songhammer, 28th level bard of E'Ci

At 04:18 PM 10/12/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>
>
>[PREXUS-LEVEL 14 BARD]
>
[snipped]
>
>But lo and behold she said she would trade! We met in the W. Commonland
>Druid ring and traded. I equipped it, and ZOOOOM!!!!! Off I went, wow, I am
>still amazed at the speed. At 13 I can outrun people in JBOOTS, and have
>outrun people with SOW. Its absolutely amazing how much ground I can get.
>
>Anyway, thats my tale.. hope it was entertaining.
>
>P.S. To date I have been able to save myself and 3 other people in
>situations where SELO alone wouldnt have done it.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
Steven S. Klug
-- sklug@...
